channel.title: +1 Forward - BOB Series - Balikbayan
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/summer-series-balikbayan
Rach and Rich continue their Summer Series. This series covers games in the Belonging Outside Belonging (BOB) style of PbtA games. This third episode features Jammi of Sword Queen Games.
Timecodes: 0:01:28 - Spend a Token... to hear Jammi talk about GMs in a BOB game 0:14:53 - You Also Play As The... person learning about BALIKBAYAN 0:27:38 - No Dice, No Masters... a demo of BALIKBAYAN with Kidlat the Aswang and Dixon the Santelmo.
Sword Queen Game's Itch store can be found here: https://temporalhiccup.itch.io/
